subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4249 is on the way
description_text:
Hello! My Pro X Ultra Pedal was delivered at the end of this week! Unfortunately, I discovered that the package was missing the "VAM Pro," the connection cables for the VAM Pro, etc., even I ordered them...? Please help and resolve this quickly! I need the gift for Christmas, and it's incomplete! Thank you and best regards, Dominik Am 02.12.2025 um 12:25 schrieb SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>: ﻿
 
 







 
 One item in your order is on the way 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN4249
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One item in your order is on the way 
 One item in your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status.

 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Other tracking number: SF3295590320870
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback × 1 

 
 Pro X Ultra-P2-H2 / Baseplate 
 

 
 
 
 Part of: Newest Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback 
 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominik Luttenberger,    This is another delivery link for your parcel, which is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. No need to worry.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114663753

Hello! I think there's a problem with the second delivery... it still hasn't been delivered, even though the first package arrived over a week ago... I need it as a Christmas present, why is the delivery of the second package taking so long and what's going wrong? Thanks for your help! Dominik Am 15.12.2025 um 09:26 schrieb service@simsonn.com: ﻿ 
 
 Hi Dominik Luttenberger, 
 
 This is another delivery link for your parcel, which is expected to arrive within the next couple of days. No need to worry. 
 https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114663753 
 
 
 
 On
 Sun, 14 Dec at 7:32 AM
 , Dominik Luttenberger <dominikluttenberger@icloud.com> wrote:
 Hello! 
 My Pro X Ultra Pedal was delivered at the end of this week! 
 
 Unfortunately, I discovered that the package was missing the "VAM Pro," the connection cables for the VAM Pro, etc., even I ordered them...? 
 
 Please help and resolve this quickly! 
 
 I need the gift for Christmas, and it's incomplete! 
 
 Thank you and best regards, Dominik 
 
 Am 02.12.2025 um 12:25 schrieb SIMSONN

Hello! I've received both packages from my order, but the VAM Pro and all the accessories for the VAM Pro are nowhere to be found...? I find this completely unacceptable! I ordered the set with the VAM Pro and I simply haven't received it...! This was supposed to be a Christmas present, and now it's incomplete because the VAM Pro are missing! I urgently need a solution! Best regards, Dominik Anfang der weitergeleiteten Nachricht:
Hi Dominik Luttenberger,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package has been delivered—did you receive it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047114663753
